issue.title: [Julia][Doc] Update lists of supported languages to include Julia
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10515](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10515). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-10228. Make sure that wherever we enumerate the various implementations that we include Julia in the list.
